title: Soil structure decline
creator_credit: Gerry North and Western Australia. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: After a short period of cultivationn, our soils are losing their inherent structure and are becoming difficult to work. This program discusses soil structure decline and its effect on agricultural productivity.
